title: Dean O'Brien ☦️
subtitle: An image taken by photographer Valery Melnikov shows the reality of life for many children in eastern Ukraine. title: Yasmin Benoit, MSc
subtitle: It was a pleasure supporting the amazing Driver family at the @PORawards today! I nominated the late Alice Driver, who was an incredible activist for LGBT+ refugees, & she won! But everyone nominated nominated was inspirational. I really do love where I live.  #PORAwardspic.twitter.com/TzX87CWyl4

title: aya r. simo
subtitle: On tokenism and disempowerment - When storytelling is not owned | "The pressure of storytelling can leave refugees feeling tokenised and disempowered. (...) There is an implicit narrative logic to the questions: ‘tragedy’ to ‘success’, ‘hell’ to ‘paradise’." pic.twitter.com/bFLizNYlXP

title: Felix Tamsut
subtitle:
“People are in dire need of items that we could easily do without"

SV Darmstadt’s fan & ultra groups will use the 2. Bundesliga game vs. Regensburg to collect items for refugees stranded in Lesbos.

The items collected: Clothes, shoes, blankets & more.
